location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to the Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, reports that the surviving crew members from the Arielare proceeding to the Presidency on board the Malabarcountry ship. He states that they have agreed with the ship's Commander that the owners shall be paid by Government whatever is customary for carrying troops or sea man [seamen] from the Gulf, in addition to payments for provisions supplied to them by the Master of the Malabar.Bruce makes a request for the Honourable Board to direct the regular customary charges to be paid.
